ngafar/llama-scan

convert PDFs to text locally with Ollama models

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • Extracts text from images and PDFs using vision models through Ollama, available as Python package and web app
  • convert scanned PDFs to markdown or epub with OCR and AI
  • Converts PDF documents to Markdown and Word formats
  • Converts PDFs into Markdown using a VLM
  • Convert PDFs to machine-readable formatslike markdown or JSON for easy data extraction
  • extracts text from images, screenshots, or PDFs using OCR, works offline, open source
  • OCR app with PDF processing and document conversion
  • npm library for OCR using Llama 3.2 Vision, outputs markdown from images
  • adds OCR text layer to scanned PDFs for searching or copying text
  • Extracts text from PDFs, images, Office docs to Markdown or JSON, supports OCR and anonymization
